argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | i2linesi.1 | |- A e. CC |
| 2 |  | i2linesi.2 | |- B e. CC |
| 3 |  | i2linesi.3 | |- C e. CC |
| 4 |  | i2linesi.4 | |- D e. CC |
| 5 |  | i2linesi.5 | |- X e. CC |
| 6 |  | i2linesi.6 | |- Y = ( ( A x. X ) + B ) |
| 7 |  | i2linesi.7 | |- Y = ( ( C x. X ) + D ) |
| 8 |  | i2linesi.8 | |- ( A - C ) =/= 0 |
| 9 | 1, 3 | #P_subcli | |- ( A - C ) e. CC |
| 10 | 3, 5 | #P_mulcli | |- ( C x. X ) e. CC |
| 11 | 4, 2 | #P_subcli | |- ( D - B ) e. CC |
| 12 | 1, 5 | #P_mulcli | |- ( A x. X ) e. CC |
| 13 | 6, 7 | #P_eqtr3i | |- ( ( A x. X ) + B ) = ( ( C x. X ) + D ) |
| 14 | 12, 2, 13 | #P_mvlraddi | |- ( A x. X ) = ( ( ( C x. X ) + D ) - B ) |
| 15 | 10, 4, 2, 14 | #P_assraddsubi | |- ( A x. X ) = ( ( C x. X ) + ( D - B ) ) |
| 16 | 10, 11, 15 | #P_mvrladdi | |- ( ( A x. X ) - ( C x. X ) ) = ( D - B ) |
| 17 | 1, 5, 3, 16 | #P_joinlmulsubmuli | |- ( ( A - C ) x. X ) = ( D - B ) |
| 18 | 9, 5, 8, 17 | #P_mvllmuli | |- X = ( ( D - B ) / ( A - C ) ) |
